conversations.content:
Hey there! I'm going to Paris on Monday and I was hoping you could help me find a restaurant that serves Chinese cuisine, is open on Mondays and has prices under 34 euros per person. Can you recommend me the restaurant with the best rating and reviews?
Tell me the restaurant name, rating, address, the price per person, and the operating hours.

<function_thought>
To assist the user in finding a suitable restaurant in Paris that serves Chinese cuisine, I will first gather a list of all restaurants in the city. Once I have this information, I will filter for Chinese restaurants. Then, I will check their opening hours to confirm they are open on Mondays, followed by retrieving the pricing information to ensure it is under 34 euros per person. Finally, I will look at the ratings and reviews to recommend the best option.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Restaurant in Paris: New Israeli Restaurant
Breizh Café
New Asiaway
Le Baratin
Bistrot Paul Bert
Royal Panda
The yard
China Garden
Miznon
Chez L'Ami Jean

<function_thought>
I have obtained a list of restaurants in Paris. Next, I will filter this list to find Chinese restaurants specifically. From the provided options, "Royal Panda" and "China Garden" appear to be Chinese restaurants. I will now check the cuisine types for these restaurants.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_cuisine_type_for_restaurants(restaurant_names=["Royal Panda", "China Garden"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
Both "Royal Panda" and "China Garden" are confirmed to serve Chinese cuisine. The next step is to check their opening hours on Mondays to see if they are available for the user’s visit.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[check_restaurant_opening_hours(restaurant_names=["Royal Panda", "China Garden"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

{'Royal Panda': '11:00 AM - 10:00 PM, open on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays', 'China Garden': '11:30 AM - 3:00 PM, 6:00 PM - 11:00 PM, open on Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays'}

<function_thought>
"Royal Panda" is not open on Mondays, while "China Garden" is open. I will now retrieve the price per person for dining at "China Garden" to ensure it is under 34 euros.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_price_for_restaurants(restaurant_names=["China Garden"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The price per person for "China Garden" is 35 euros, which exceeds the user's budget of 34 euros. I need to determine if there are other dining options available within the specified price range. Since "Royal Panda" is unavailable for Monday and "China Garden" exceeds the price limit, I should check for other restaurants that serve Chinese cuisine.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
